languages.text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: До конца боя, когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} наносит {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g}, он получает +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} (с округлением в меньшую сторону).

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the Assassin hits an opening, they gain +<u>(lethality)/15</u> (rounded down) temporary wounds.
Until the end of combat, whenever the Assassin hits an opening, they gain +<u>(lethality)/15</u> (rounded down) temporary wounds.

Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

Until the end of combat, whenever the Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

languages.text: До конца боя, когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} наносит {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}удар{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}слабое место{/g}, он получает +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} (с округлением в меньшую сторону).
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя, когда ассасин наносит удар в слабое место, он получает +<u>(число уровней летальности / 15)</u> временного здоровья (с округлением в меньшую сторону).
До конца боя, когда ассасин наносит удар в слабое место, он получает +<u>(число уровней летальности / 15)</u> временного здоровья (с округлением в меньшую сторону).

До конца боя, когда ассасин наносит {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}удар{/g} в слабое место, он получает +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} (с округлением в меньшую сторону).

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}破绽{/g}时，都会获得{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}（向下取整），直到战斗结束为止。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当刺客{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}破绽时，都会获得<u>（致命）/15</u>（向下取整）点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，直到战斗结束为止。
每当刺客{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}破绽时，都会获得{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2}（向下取整）点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，直到战斗结束为止。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, gana +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (redondeando hacia abajo) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} en una {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}abertura{/g}, gana +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (redondeando hacia abajo) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

Hasta el final del combate, cada vez que el asesino aseste un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} en una zona desprotegida, gana +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (redondeando hacia abajo) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhält der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} immer, wenn er eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (abgerundet) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhält der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} immer, wenn er eine {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Blöße{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (abgerundet) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erhält der Assassine jedes Mal, wenn er eine Blöße {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g} +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (abgerundet) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}brèche{/g}, il gagne +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (valeur arrondie au nombre entier inférieur) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, chaque fois que l'Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une ouverture, il gagne +<u>(létalité) / 15</u> (valeur arrondie au nombre entier inférieur) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

Jusqu'à la fin du combat, chaque fois que l'Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une ouverture, il gagne +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (valeur arrondie au nombre entier inférieur) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}させた時、+{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2}（切り捨て）の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、アサシンが初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させた時、+<u>（致死率）/15</u>（切り捨て）の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
戦闘終了まで、アサシンが初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させた時、+{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2}（切り捨て）の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
